Overview: Digital Health Equity introduces individual, interpersonal, and societal influences on health, and how such influences create health disparities. Using this knowledge as a foundation, the course examines how digital health technologies can be designed to achieve health equity, and how the varied influences on health shape access to, utilization of, and impact of digital health systems.
Academic Integrity: All Georgia Tech students are expected to uphold theGeorgia Tech Academic Honor Code. This course may impose additional academic integrity stipulations; consult the official course documentation for more information.
